title: An enquiry into the power of dispensing with penal statutes together with some animadversions upon a book writ by Sir Edw. Herbert ... entituled, A short account of the authorities in law, upon which judgment was given in Sir Edward Hales's case / by Sir Robert Atkyns ...
author: Atkyns, Robert, Sir, 1621-1709.
notes: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
